original_text: Now there was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam all the days of his life.
korean_text: 르호보암과 여로보암 사이에 사는 날 동안 전쟁이 있었더니

sentences.original_text: Now there was war between Rehoboam and Jeroboam
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 르호보암과 여로보암 사이에 전쟁이 있었다

sentences.original_text: all the days of his life.
